reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant, describing it as regal and sexy, with one noting its satin-like appearance.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for a formal event/party
items.body: Beautiful and soft dress. Super flattering and stretchy so it’s comfortable all night. As a shorty (5’3), the length was perfect with or without tall shoes. The color was more of a deep mulberry color, the picture doesn’t do it justice. Read more
items.author: Corrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wash on delicate, let it dry on warm & the dress to hang for a bit and ready for you to wear!
items.body: What a gorgeous dress! This beautiful silky black dress fit comfortably on me from my shoulders right down to the length of my heels. I am 5’3, 148 pounds and ordered a medium, which according to Amazon, is true to my size. This dress accentuates your waistline and overall flattering. I got so many compliments from my husband and at the concert from strangers! What a great value for your money! I highly recommend to purchase this dress, especially now for the Holidays! Read more
items.author: Pamela Marquez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and beautiful
items.body: Absolutely stunning in person! I don’t have to wear a faja cuz the slight ruffle is in the perfect spot to hide the belly! The tube top comes with an arm sleeve so the dress is never going to ride down. It’s comfortable, light and silky…feels amazing ! 10/10 would recommend! Read more
items.author: Malorie Fabian

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful! Loved the fabric and fit!
items.body: Beautiful and affordable! The fit was very comfy, it’s a stretchy sporty material that looks like satin. I loveeeed it! The fabric weight was perfect and I feel like it held its shape. The only downside was that the top sits verrry low. I tried to keep it up, but because of the way the dress is made, it just sits very low. So all night I was fighting it. Overall a wonderful dress! Read more
items.author: Halee Story

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: It is very tight on the breast area and arms but a bit looser in the stomach area. It fits well and looks very pretty. I was wearing a fajafit and it didn’t mark in the front. I do recommend getting a size up and having waist adjusted if you have a hour clock shape. Even if you’re on a heavier size like me. I’m 150 5’2. I reaaaaally love the dress Read more
items.author: ty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect evening or wedding event gown!
items.body: Gorgeous!! Love the material! Read more
items.author: Louise Ayersman

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall fair-but did return
items.body: I wanted to love this BUT the top just wasn’t a great fit. The strapless band part that folds down was thinner than expected and didn’t fold over nicely like it does in the pic. Wasn’t flattering on me. If you have a bigger chest, it probably will be the same for you as well. I am 5’7 and ordered a M. It is true to size. The color and material was actually super nice, not see through and not a lot of stretch…The waist was really beautiful and the slit was a good height but I had to return just for the way the top portion looked on me. Read more
items.author: Brittany Fuller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: Very flattering fit. Great color. I purchased the burgundy in a medium. The dress arrived quickly. I'm 5'3 and 165lbs. The only complaint I have it that it does ride up a bit when going to sit, not enough to show anything but if you are wearing shorts/spanx underneath it you may see them or have to pull the dress down around your hips frequently. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split High Split Bodycon Off Shoulder Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split High Split Bodycon Off Shoulder Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darknavy, Red, Rose Red, Deep Blue, Burgundy, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
